item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利亚洲明星银行家的奖金最高将增加 50
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，由于业务增长强劲和去年的低基数效应，摩根士丹利在亚洲表现最出色的投资银行家和交易员的奖金最多将增加 50%。【原文：Morgan Stanley's top-performing investment bankers and traders in Asia will see up to a 50% increase in bonuses due to robust business growth and a low-base effect of last year, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度富豪用 1.85 万美元的智能马桶打造奢华浴室
item.description: 在印度污染严重的北部城市坎普尔，Rajat Ghai 对雷达表和路易威登鞋情有独钟。现在，这位 31 岁的企业家正在建造自己的梦想家园，他正在用豪华浴室来满足自己的设计师品味。【原文：In India's polluted northern city of Kanpur, Rajat Ghai has a penchant for Rado watches and Louis Vuitton shoes. Now, as the 31-year-old entrepreneur builds his dream home, he is indulging his designer tastes with a luxury bathroom.】

item.title: 日本工资增长势头强劲，零售商不愿加薪
item.description: 日本的零售商通常是最吝啬的雇主之一，他们连续第二年大幅加薪，这意味着公司的利润受到挤压，工人的支出增加，央行也为更多的加息开了绿灯。【原文：Japan's retailers, typically among the most tight-fisted of employers, are offering big pay increases for a second year in a row, meaning squeezed profits for companies, more spending money for workers, and a green light for more central bank rate hikes.】

item.title: 股市沐浴特朗普光辉，关税不确定性拖累美元
item.description: 周三全球股市上涨，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一系列新政策与强劲的企业盈利相结合，增强了投资者的乐观情绪，而关税的不确定性则使美元维持在两周低点附近。【原文：Global stocks gained on Wednesday as a flurry of new policies from U.S. President Donald Trump combined with robust corporate earnings to bolster investor optimism, while tariff uncertainty kept the dollar near two-week lows.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Venture Global LNG 将下调大规模 IPO 的价格区间
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的消息人士周二表示，Venture Global LNG 公司正准备削减其首次公开发行股票的拟议价格范围，并增加可能出售给投资者的股票数量。【原文：Venture Global LNG is preparing to cut the proposed price range for its blockbuster initial public offering and increase the number of shares it may sell to investors, a source with direct knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易员思考特朗普关税计划，美元走低
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划缺乏明确性，金融市场一直在猜测，美元在周三的交易中小幅走低。【原文：The dollar drifted slightly lower on Wednesday in indecisive trading as a lack of clarity on President Donald Trump's plans for tariffs kept financial markets guessing.】

item.title: 投资者热议特朗普 2.0 政策，油价保持稳定
item.description: 周三早盘，油价变化不大，因为市场在权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普上任首日宣布全国能源紧急状态及其对供应的影响。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early trading on Wednesday as markets weighed U.S. President Donald Trump's declaration of a national energy emergency on his first day in office and its impact on supply.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，TikTok 的所有者 ByteDance 计划在 2025 年斥资 120 亿美元购买人工智能芯片
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二援引消息人士的话报道，字节跳动公司（ByteDance）正在对人工智能（AI）基础设施下大赌注，TikTok 母公司计划在 2025 年在人工智能领域投入超过 120 亿美元。【原文：ByteDance is placing a big bet on artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure as the TikTok parent plans to spend more than $12 billion on AI in 2025, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 微软斥资 5000 亿美元成立合资公司，放松对 OpenAI 数据中心的控制
item.description: 在 ChatGPT 创建者宣布与甲骨文公司和日本软银集团成立合资企业，在美国建设高达 5000 亿美元的新人工智能数据中心之后，微软周二表示，它已修改了与 OpenAI 协议的一些关键条款。【原文：Microsoft on Tuesday said it has changed some key terms of a deal with OpenAI after the ChatGPT creator announced a joint venture with Oracle and Japan's SoftBank Group to build up to $500 billion of new AI data centers in the United States.】

item.title: 日本寻找军民两用产品制造商助力军事扩张
item.description: 总部位于京都的三津富士（Mitsufuji）公司在近 70 年前起步，当时是一家和服装饰带纺织厂。不久的将来，它可能会纺制高科技纤维，用于屏蔽战斗机的电磁干扰。【原文：Kyoto-based Mitsufuji got its start nearly 70 years ago as a weaver of decorative belts for kimonos. One day soon, it could be spinning high-tech fibres to shield fighter jets from electromagnetic interference.】

item.title: Meta 前首席运营官桑德伯格因删除电子邮件遭投资者起诉
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司前首席运营官谢丽尔-桑德伯格（Sheryl Sandberg）因删除与 Facebook 剑桥分析隐私丑闻诉讼相关的电子邮件而于周二受到法官的处罚，尽管她被告知要保留这些邮件。【原文：Meta Platforms' former chief operating officer, Sheryl Sandberg, was sanctioned by a judge on Tuesday for deleting emails related to litigation over Facebook's Cambridge Analytica privacy scandal, despite being told to preserve the messages.】

item.title: 液化天然气公司欢呼特朗普取消出口许可冻结的决定
item.description: 三家在得克萨斯州和路易斯安那州开发液化天然气（LNG）项目的公司表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普解除上届政府对出口许可的冻结后，他们将全速推进自己的计划。【原文：Three companies developing liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects in Texas and Louisiana said they will move full speed ahead with their plans after U.S. President Donald Trump lifted the previous administration's freeze on export permits.】

item.title: 特朗普表示，如果特斯拉首席执行官愿意，他对马斯克收购 TikTok 持开放态度
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，如果特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克愿意收购社交媒体应用 TikTok，他对亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克持开放态度。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he was open to billionaire Elon Musk buying social media app TikTok if the Tesla CEO wanted to do so.】

item.title: 美国发行商 REX Advisers 和 Osprey 寻求批准推出特朗普备忘录硬币 ETF
item.description: 据周二提交的一份文件显示，就在唐纳德-特朗普总统推出他的新加密代币几天后，两家资产管理公司联合向监管机构申请批准，首次推出与数字货币或 "meme 币 "挂钩的交易所交易基金。【原文：Just days after President Donald Trumplaunched his new crypto token, two asset management firms jointly sought regulatory approval to debut an exchange-traded fund tied to the digital currency or "meme coin," according to a Tuesday filing.】

item.title: 贸易组织称佐治亚州爆发禽流感威胁美国鸡肉出口
item.description: 一个行业组织周二表示，美国最大的鸡肉生产国佐治亚州爆发的家禽禽流感疫情将引发主要肉类进口商的贸易限制，该组织警告说，此举可能会给农民和加工商带来经济损失。【原文：An outbreak of bird flu in poultry in the U.S. state of Georgia, the nation's biggest chicken producer, is set to trigger trade restrictions from major meat importers, an industry group said on Tuesday, warning of a move that could financially harm farmers and processors.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言对欧盟征收关税，并计划于 2 月 1 日对中国征收 10%的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发誓要对欧盟征收关税，并表示他的政府正在讨论在 2 月 1 日对从中国进口的商品征收 10%的关税，因为芬太尼正从中国运往墨西哥和加拿大。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump vowed to hit the European Union with tariffs and said his administration was discussing imposing a 10% tariff on goods imported from China on Feb. 1 because fentanyl is being sent from China to Mexico and Canada.】

item.title: 贝莱德与温斯坦的萨巴公司就封闭式基金之争达成和解
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）和萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）宣布，双方就封闭式基金的未来展开的长期争斗已陷入僵局，资产管理公司回购了两个投资组合的股份，对冲基金则放弃了深入改革管理层的要求。【原文：BlackRock and Saba Capital Management announced a standstill in a long-raging battle over the future of closed-end funds with the asset manager buying back shares in two portfolios and the hedge fund dropping demands for deep management changes.】

item.title: 特朗普称 OpenAI、软银和甲骨文将向人工智能领域投资 5000 亿美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二宣布，三家领先公司将对人工智能基础设施进行大规模投资。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday announced that three leading companies would make a large investment in artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 双菱表示，尽管预算预测有所改善，但美国财政之路难以为继
item.description: 投资公司 DoubleLine 的一位分析师周二表示，美国的主权债务状况仍然难以为继，赤字的扩大幅度可能会超过国会预算办公室最近的预测。【原文：The U.S. sovereign debt profile remains on an unsustainable path with deficits likely to widen more than what has been recently projected by the Congressional Budget Office, an analyst at investment firm DoubleLine said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称沃伦-巴菲特的领航公司关闭石油交易业务
item.description: 三位消息人士周二告诉路透社，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的领航公司（Pilot Co）将关闭其国际石油贸易业务，结束对全球万亿美元市场的涉足，重新专注于其在美国的 Pilot Flying J 服务站和卡车加油站。【原文：Warren Buffett's Pilot Co is shuttering its international oil trading business, ending an excursion into the trillion-dollar global market to refocus on its Pilot Flying J service stations and truck stops in the U.S., three sources told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 前先锋公司首席执行官起诉美国联邦贸易委员会禁止他进入埃克森董事会
item.description: 先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）前首席执行官斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）周二起诉美国联邦贸易委员会，称该委员会在埃克森美孚公司以价值 595 亿美元的交易收购先锋公司时，禁止他加入埃克森美孚董事会的做法违反了法律。【原文：Former Pioneer Natural Resources CEO Scott Sheffield sued the U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Tuesday, saying it violated the law by barring his inclusion on Exxon Mobil's board when the company acquired Pioneer in a deal worth $59.5 billion.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称，在 SpaceX 游说之后，特朗普可能会废除太空委员会
item.description: 据三位熟悉该计划的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的新政府很可能取消白宫的国家太空委员会，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的说客们一直在推动取消这个内阁政策小组。【原文：President Donald Trump's new administration is likely to do away with the White House's National Space Council, a cabinet policy panel that lobbyists at Elon Musk's SpaceX have been pushing to axe, according to three people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 特朗普试图给墨西哥卡特尔贴上 "外国恐怖分子 "标签，给公司和移民带来风险
item.description: 周一晚间，唐纳德-特朗普总统呼吁美国国务院将墨西哥贩毒集团贴上 "外国恐怖组织 "的标签，分析人士称，此举扩大了美国执法部门对犯罪集团的打击范围，但有可能使国际商业活动复杂化，限制庇护申请，并使美国与墨西哥的关系紧张。【原文：On Monday night, President Donald Trump called for the State Department to label Mexican cartels as "foreign terrorist organizations," a move that increases the reach of U.S. law enforcement over the criminal groups but risks complicating international business, restricting asylum claims, and straining relations with Mexico, analysts say.】

item.title: 亚洲 美元大幅波动，不确定性迷雾重重？习惯就好
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Capital One 第四季度利润因利息收入增加而大幅增长
item.description: Capital One Financial 周二报告称，由于利息收入增加，这家消费贷款公司第四季度利润增长了 60%。【原文：Capital One Financial reported a 60% rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, as a higher income from interests helped the consumer lender.】

item.title: 加密货币金融公司在联邦调查局调查后认罪
item.description: 周二，一家加密货币金融服务公司同意对美国的指控认罪，该公司在联邦调查局的授意下帮助操纵一种数字代币的市场，以帮助揭露加密货币领域的欺诈行为。【原文：A cryptocurrency financial services firm agreed on Tuesday to plead guilty to U.S. charges that it offered to help manipulate the market for a digital token created at the FBI's behest to help uncover fraud in the crypto sector.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司季度利润增长
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周二预计本季度利润将高于预期，此前该公司第四季度的盈利因强劲的旅行需求和定价能力的提高而超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：United Airlines on Tuesday forecast a stronger-than-expected profit in the current quarter, after its earnings topped Wall Street estimates in the fourth quarter on robust travel demand and improved pricing power.】

item.title: Netflix 节假日季度新增 1900 万订户，创历史新高
item.description: Netflix 周二发布报告称，该公司假日季度新增用户 1890 万，超过了华尔街的预期，其中体育赛事直播和韩国热门剧集《乌贼游戏》的回归吸引了创纪录数量的新用户。【原文：Netflix added 18.9 million subscribers in its holiday quarter, blowing past Wall Street's forecasts, with live sporting events and the return of its popular South Korean series "Squid Game" attracting a record number of new customers, the company reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州港口在寒冷天气中限制活动
item.description: 弗里波特港周二表示，预计船只活动有限，而休斯顿港则表示，由于冬季风暴恩佐席卷得克萨斯州，该港所有公共设施将在周三前继续关闭。【原文：Port Freeport on Tuesday said it expects limited vessel activity while Port Houston said all of its public facilities will remain closed through Wednesday as winter storm Enzo sweeps through Texas.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，道明银行希望出售 90 亿美元抵押贷款以达到资产上限
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）正计划出售约 90 亿美元的住宅抵押贷款，以调整其资产负债表，遵守美国监管机构规定的新上限。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is aiming to sell about $9 billion of residential mortgage loans in order to modify its balance sheet to comply with a new cap imposed by the U.S. regulators, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】
